body.name: Beelink Mini PC AMD Ryzen 7 5800H Up to 4.4GHz 8C/16T,Mini Computer 16GB DDR4 RAM/500GB M.2 SSD Graphics 8 core 2000 MHz Wifi6/BT5.2/HDMI+DP+Type-C,Support 4K Triple Displays
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
features: 【54W High Performance Mini PC】The MAX 5800H Mini PC is an upgraded version of the Beelink SER5 5800H with AMD Ryzen 7 5800H (up to 4.4GHz,8C/16T,L3 cache 16MB),the TDP has been upgraded from 35W to 54W,with a 21% performance improvement compared to the 5800H.The ryzen mini pc is High performance and fast running,capable of easily handling spreadsheets,email,coding applications,web browsing, photo/video editing,light gaming(CSGO,PUBG,DOTA 2,LOL, League of Legends...).

【16GB RAM & 500GB PCIe3.0 SSD】 The mini computers is equipped 16GB 3200MHz DDR4 RAM and 500GB M.2 PCIe3.0 2280 SSD.(With two memory slots that can be upgraded to 64GB). Mini pc 16gb ram reads up to 3000Mb/s,makes your entire system speedy and responsive.You also have the option to expand your storage to a whopping 2TB with a 2.5-inch HDD/SSD,and with these,this beelink mini PC offers fast startup and loading of applications, as well as a large amount of storage space for your various files.

【4k High Definition Triple Displays】The micro computer integrates AMD Radeon Graphics 8core 2000 MHz GPU, providing powerful graphics processing power to easily handle the needs of complex design software,4K UHD video editing and playback,or light gaming.Mini desktop computer Support 4K Triple displays (1*HDIM+1*DP+Type-C) to simplify and double your productivity.It's a great choice for visual home entertainment,office meetings or online learning.

【Meet Other Needs】Small form factor pc is about 4.96x4.44x1.65 inches,easy to carry and save space. AMD mini pc with new fan brackets,system fans and SSD heat sinks to achieve good cooling effect,eat dissipation performance improved by 19%.Our beelink ser5 is equipped with an internal wireless network card supporting WiFi6 & Bluetooth 5.2 and a RJ45 LAN port supporting 1000Mbps Ethernet,which offer strong wireless signal,fast wireless connections and reliable transmission speed.

【Lifetime Technical Support】Ryzen 7 mini pc Package Included:1* Beelink MAX Ser5 5800H Mini PC,2* HDMI Cables(20cm & 80cm),1* Power adapter,1* User manual,1* Mounting bracket.If you want to set up automatic startup,please contact us.All of our mini pc obtained FCC,CE ROSH Certifications.We Offer 1 Year Free Warranty,and 7 Days/24 Hours Serving,and lifetime technical issue assistance without worrying about quality,just email to our customer service team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Beelink SER5 MAX 5800H Mini PC 16GB RAM 500GB M.2 SSD,8C/16T,Up to 4.4GHz Are you tired of your clunky desktop computer? If you need a desktop computer that doesn't take up any desktop space,the Beelink Mini is great for the job. It's a powerful PC, so small you can fit it in your pocket.Whether it is office,study,games, entertainment,can meet your needs anytime and anywhere. Why choose Beelink MAX 5800H mini pc? + Super portable,MAX 5800H Mini pc size is about 4.96*4.44*1.65 inches,covers a small space,is also easy to carry out,very convenient. + Enjoy faster WiFi speeds with WiFi6. + Lots of ports to connect your favorite devices. + Fast and powerful hardware for a variety of daily tasks with an impressive small PC. + Ultra HD 4K,perfect for enjoying movies with family or friends. + Expandable storage,no need to worry about storage space shortage. +Multifuncation Mini Pc - Whether it is office work, education, light gaming and industry, home theater pc, or Office applications, web browsing, video playback, it can meet your expectations and needs. This excellent storage performance helps to treat the Beelink mini pc as a reliable desktop pc,meaning that startup,shutdown,application startup,and document load and save times are significantly faster and more consistent.Word, Excel, PPT and other office software;Some design software like PS, PR, AI can run smoothly without lag or lag.

AMD Ryzen MAX 7 5800H 8 cores / 16 threads; the base frequency is 3.3ghz, the maximum frequency is 4.4ghz The MAX 5800H Mini Pc processor is very powerful, with a 3.3ghz base frequency and 4.4ghz top frequency; The maximum frequency is 4.4Ghz, which can bring you faster data processing capability; 8C/16T supports multiple open applications, multi-tasking, to meet the purpose of daily multi-tasking cooperation, No lag, happy mood to complete work or daily needs.

Strong Wireless Suppor WiFi 6 Supports More AndFaster Terminals,No network cong estion and lower latency Bluetooth 5.2 for greater stability and efficiency.Enjoy stable WiFi connection, even in the kitchen and bedroom.PC Mini also supports RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet, experience wired speed and reliability anywhere in your home or office. Multiport Design 1*HDMI Port 1*Display Port 3*USB3.2 Gen2(10Gbps) 1*USB2.0 1*Type-C 1*DC jack 1*RJ45 1000m port 1*Audio jack (HP & MIC) port Beelink Mini PC is a good monitor partner,you can use it to connect to any monitor,Meet your needs for work,life and play. Mini Size The mini pc measures 4.96*4.44*1.65 inchs and is about the size of your palm. You can easily put it on the desktop, giving you a comfortable desktop workspace, or take it outside at any time, or install it behind the mini pc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed something small and this has more power than I thought it would have. Sure, it's using one of the "H" cpus and has integrated graphics, but this particular combination is as capable as my 7th gen i7 Desktop with discrete graphics - and is more powerful in some aspects.The fan does run when under a load, but that's understandable for the footprint this thing is trying to occupy - and the fan is a lot quieter at full speed than most of the other computer fans I've been around. They must have invested in quality fans that produce sound at a frequency that is not nearly as "noisy" as others.I'm running it at 4k and it will tackle a browser-based game just fine. It starts up nice and snappy, and handles all the office work I can throw at it. That, and I can hide it behind the monitor or stick it in my pocket. The bluetooth works great with my Logitech KB/Mouse so I don't have to have an extra dongle, but there are tons of outputs if I needed to. Having DisplayPort as well as HDMI was a plus for me since my monitors cover the spectrum of inputs due to their widely varying age. For a simple office setup, the HDMI cable delivers sound through the monitor speakers and bluetooth connects KB/Mouse, so I've only got 2 wires out the back and no dongles. It's clean - and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful little machine for work!
reviews.reviewText: Are you going to be able to run games like Valorant, Warcraft, Diablo on it?No. Absolutely not. But that's okay.I specifically got this little mini pc to be able to replace my bigger normal size desktop tower for work and it has been amazing!I run a lot of large Excel files that contain everything from graphs and pivot tables to macros and large formulas.At any given time I usually have 3-6 chrome tabs, outlook, teams, 2-6 excel files, and multiple other small internal company programs open and this thing has been able to handle all of them beautifully!If I do have all that open when I try to run an Excel macro I do notice the fans kick on.They're not super loud but you do notice it.However, after my macro has completed its task everything quiets back down.The only thing this does not have is speakers but I'm wearing a headset a majority of the time so I don't really miss that or even notice it.Taking into account the CPU power, a 500gb SSD, & 16gb of RAM among other things, this thing can pack a powerful punch and is well worth the price!After being able to demonstrate the differences between my old tower and this I've actually got work to start buying a couple more for others in the department that needed upgraded as well.10/10 would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very capable mini PC with a serious flaw (update regarding replacement)
reviews.reviewText: Update April 10, 23: Note that my review is for the SER 5560 which is not currently sold on Amazon. Beelink replaced my SER 5560 under warranty with an SER 5800. This unit is, so far, totally satisfactory without the restart issues of the 5560. It does not have Wi-Fi 6E (just Wi-Fi 6) but otherwise is a more capable until. While I'm not happy about having to return the unit, in the end I am satisfied with the SER 5800 that I now have. Updated stars to fouf. Update March 23: Unfortunately, I've had to update my review. Dropping the rating from five stars to two stars. The reason for that drop is that my Beelink SER5 is generally not capable of restarting unless totally disconnected from its power supply. That means that Windows Updates or driver updates that require a restart/reboot are quite problematic. Beelink acknowledges the issue in its support forum and suggests returning the PC but I'm past the 30 day window and Amazon support seems to be no help. The symptom seems to be limited to units with an AZW V1.0 motherboard which Beelink says is defective. I have reached out to Beelink support directly but haven't received any reply. I suggest perspective customers for this unit avoid it and look elsewhere either for a different model or different manufacturer.Prior review before I discovered the restart issue:The Beelink SER5 (Ryzen 5 5560U) more than meets my expectations. It is quite powerful, appears well constructed and conformed to the description on Amazon. Shipping was quick and the product arrived in pristine condition. I'm not a gamer, so I can't speak to how well it would perform as a gaming machine but it does not have a separate GPU, so I'd say gaming isn't really the intended purpose of the unit.I did some benchmarks for those interested: Cinebench 23: 7877 multicore, 1288 single core. Geekbench 5: CPU--1333 single core, 6029 multicore. Compute 11775. Crystal Disk Mark 5 showed a read data rate of 3,044 and a write data rate of 1645 MB/s for the NVME drive.Pros: 1) Quiet, generally inaudible even under load. I hear the fan briefly at start-up and then all is pretty silent. 2) Bios is unlocked and there are lots of options (and a front panel reset). 3) Two 4K HDMI ports 4) Wifi 6E. 5) Windows 11 Pro has no bloatware. 6) Internal temperatures stay well under thermal throttling limits even with Windows 11 Pro optioned to the performance profile (25 watts). The case is well ventilated. 6) Memory and the internal NVME drive can be upgraded easily above the 16 gigs and 500 gigs provided.Minor Cons: 1) AMD Master software (for overclocking) won't run since these is really a laptop processor where heat under limited ventilation is critical. 2) The provided method for attaching the Beelink to a VESA mount is just a bracket with screw holes, so once the Beelink is attached to a monitor, it will take a bit of effort to dismount it to, for example, add a hard drive. 3) The method of adding an internal SSD or 2.5 inch drive requires removing screws, prying open the case, and carefully avoiding damaging the internal drive cable. 4) The wi-fi range isn't excellent. My Beelink, while able to transfer data at full speed when close to my router, had speeds fall off more than other devices (Apple and Android) at the same ~20 foot distance from my router. I think an external antenna might help. I can't test the units 6E capabilities since it is the only such device I have. 5) By its nature (size), there are limited upgrade opportunities beyond memory and NVME/SSD disks. 6) Being picky I wish for the 2 USB ports on the back of the machine to be 3.0 rather then 2.0 and for the audio port to be on the rear rather than front of the computer.To conclude (edited): I think the restart issue is a "show stopper". While the capabilities of the Beelink are awesome, the failure of the restart sequence is serious and MIGHT mean other serious issues will surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice backup mini pc. I want to use it as a media server
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't get the higher end mini pc, as it was unavailable. I have several computers and this is a nice backup for media. It isn't a workstation, but I already have one of those and I wanted a little backup pc. I have another Beelink Mini pc and it works well as a backup pc, too. I want to expand the RAM on both pcs, but they both work well for what I am using them for. I like Beelink and I like the small footprint the pc provides. It is solidly built and performs well. I am not a gamer, so I cannot provide feedback about that. But, as a multimedia developer, I think it handles resource intensive programs just fine. I am very happy with my purchase.
